strings.Value: {g|Arcane2_1}[Choice effects]{/g} "I wish to control weather and luck."
{g|Arcane2_3}[Choice effects]{/g} "I wish to influence the minds of my subjects."

{n}Octavia grins from ear to ear.{/n} "Your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} attracts the most unusual and interesting characters! They must have heard the rumors that your country is a place where one can live without chains and restrictions! Not long ago, I was visited by an appraiser of magical items – a rare and sought-after profession in many countries!"

"This man proposed that he settle in our lands and open his own store. I agreed then and there – why can't we be as good as {g|Absalom}Absalom{/g}, right? In tribute, he offered his new ruler a valuable gift! But he didn't dare select a specific item for you. Instead he simply invites you to choose from all the finest things he keeps in his best store-rooms!" {n}Octavia hands you a small list, written on a piece of parchment in ornate handwriting.{/n} "We'd best not be greedy, and choose just one item."

{n}The Storyteller bows and hands you a piece of parchment, on which is printed a short list, written in ornate handwriting.{/n} "My respects, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. I hasten to hand you this paper, that I have received from your new subject."

"An appraiser of magical items has settled in the capital. We are nearly colleagues, and this news fills my heart with joy." {n}The Storyteller smiles.{/n} "Grateful for his new home, the appraiser asks {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness} to choose as a gift one of the artifacts from his store-rooms. See for yourself..."

{n}You look through the list. The appraiser offers you a choice of three magical items: one of them attracts good weather and good luck, the second one allows you to dominate animals, and the third one – to influence the emotions of sentient creatures.{/n}

{n}"Maegar" waves a piece of parchment in the air.{/n} "An appraiser of magical items has come to the castle, hat in hand – a pathetic toady, trying to win over the {mf|baron|baroness|King|Queen} with trivial gifts. What can be more amusing than the groveling of a miserable worm? I would have laughed at the fool and thrown him out, were it not for one of the items he offers."
"Great! I will express your gratitude to the appraiser!"

"This paper lists everything you can choose from. Among other things there's an artifact that allows its owner some measure of control over the minds of mortals." {n}The eyes of "Maegar" flash.{/n} "If I were you... {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}... that is exactly what I would choose. Never underestimate the intersection of magic and power."
